body_html:
Thanks. Sorry, my bad.

It is another issue, but it seems that is not 100% compatible with 1.0 guidelines though. It uses tf.get_variable_scope().reuse_variables() and the docs say (https://www.tensorflow.org/install/migration):
Constructions like tf.get_variable_scope().reuse_variables() will likely not work.

body:
Thanks. Sorry, my bad.

It is another issue, but it seems that is not 100% compatible with 1.0 guidelines though. It uses tf.get_variable_scope().reuse_variables() and the docs say (https://www.tensorflow.org/install/migration):
Constructions like tf.get_variable_scope().reuse_variables() will likely not work.
